name: PROVIDENCE GRAVURE, INC. v. John H. NORBERG, Tax Administrator

parties: PROVIDENCE GRAVURE, INC. v. John H. NORBERG, Tax Administrator.

opinions.text:
ORDER
The petition for writ of certiorari is denied.

attorneys: Edwards & Angelí, Edward F. Hindle, Philip B. Barr, Jr., Jeffrey C. Schreck, Providence, for petitioner.
Dennis J. Roberts II, Atty. Gen., Stephen Lichatin III, Asst. Atty. Gen., Perry Shat-kin, Chief Legal Officer (Taxation), for respondent.
casebody.head_matter:
PROVIDENCE GRAVURE, INC. v. John H. NORBERG, Tax Administrator.
No. 81-294-M.P.
Supreme Court of Rhode Island.
Oct. 22, 1981.
Edwards & Angelí, Edward F. Hindle, Philip B. Barr, Jr., Jeffrey C. Schreck, Providence, for petitioner.
Dennis J. Roberts II, Atty. Gen., Stephen Lichatin III, Asst. Atty. Gen., Perry Shat-kin, Chief Legal Officer (Taxation), for respondent.
